description: Numbers n such that x^n + x^9 + 2 is irreducible over GF(3).
comments: All terms are even, as 2 is a root if n is odd. - _Robert Israel_, Dec 31 2015
maple: select(n  -> Irreduc(x^n + x^9 + 2) mod 3, 2*[$1..1000]); # _Robert Israel_, Dec 31 2015
mathematica: Do[ If[ ToString[ Factor[ x^n + x^9 + 2, Modulus -> 3 ] ] == ToString[ x^n + x^9 + 2 ], Print[ n ] ], {n, 0, 1600} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 01 2000
extensions: a(10) and a(11) from _Robert Israel_, Dec 31 2015
